The State of Net Neutrality, August 2018 ⚖️

Aug 21, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • politics
  • net neutrality

Our host Ryan Koch discusses the issue of Net Neutrality. We explore this complex topic talking through what it is, who the players are, and where it stands today.
